1.title: Welcome To The Empire
1.plot: The story of co-founders of Melt Cosmetics, Dana Bomar and Lora Arellano, begins with 5 matte lipsticks, a little friendship, and a whole lot of attitude. Watch their fearless journey on LIPSTICK EMPIRE.

2.title: Make Love To The Camera
2.plot: Bring on the gowns, glitz and vintage glam in this episode of #LIPSTICKEMPIRE with Dana Bomar and Lora Arellano, the faces of their independent makeup brand - Meltcosmetics.

3.title: What Really Grinds My Gears
3.plot: It's all love, and it's all in the family with Melt Cosmetics co-founders Dana Bomar and Lora Arellano as they assemble the team that will support them in their rise to makeup world super stardom. And find out what REALLY grinds Lora's gears.

4.title: Gun (Metal) Control
4.plot: Dana Bomar and Jake realize they suck at wedding planning. Lora Arellano and Dana meet with Chef Eugene about feeding the crowd at the BBQ sale. Dana and Lora meet with the lab about crumbling eyeshadow samples.

5.title: It's A Poopocalypse
5.plot: The girls (Lora Arellano and Dana Bomar) review another set of Gun Metal eyeshadow samples from the lab to see if they're done right. The day of the BBQ sale finally arrives - will it be a huge success or a flop for the Melt Cosmetics team?

6.title: Balance of Power
6.plot: Lora Arellano gets a call for an upcoming makeup gig with Shaunie O'Neal and has to ask Dana Bomar to run Melt Cosmetics while she's gone. Dana and Jake decide to hire a wedding planner.

7.title: Division of Power
7.plot: Dana Bomar runs the show at Melt Cosmetics while Lora Arellano is away, but things take a turn when an issue comes up. Lora makes Shaunie O'Neal look glamorous for her event but worries about the business.

8.title: A Little Bit Crazy
8.plot: The Melt team comes up with names for new products. Lora Arellano and Cecilia visit their dad's restaurant. The ladies head to the lab for what they hope is the final approval of the Gun Metal Stack.

9.title: Finding the Leak
9.plot: Lora and Tony practice their parenting skills with their nieces and dogs. Lora Arellano and Dana Bomar discover that someone leaked a photo of the new eyeshadow stack on Instagram.

10.title: Shooting Your Gun (Metal)
10.plot: Lora Arellano and Tony discuss the possibility of babies. The ladies hash out details with popular beauty blogger Ourfa Zinali for an upcoming collaboration. Dana Bomar and Jake meet the wedding planner. The Gun Metal Stack launches, but the ladies fear the worst with sales.

11.title: Prank Wars
11.plot: Dana Bomar plays a colorful prank on Lora Arellano, and Lora enlists the team to get Dana back. The girls meet with Frends Beauty Supply about potentially putting Melt Cosmetics products in a store for the first time ever.

12.title: They Came, They Saw, They Contoured
12.plot: SEASON FINALE: Dana freaks Jake out at dinner when she reveals some news. The staff tries out Melt's new Prime Rose Collection lipstick line. The ladies make a decision on Frends Beauty Supply. Dana Bomar and Lora Arellano throw a party to celebrate Melt Cosmetics' recent success.

imdb.plot outline: In LIPSTICK EMPIRE, follow Lora Arellano and Dana Bomar, co-founders and CEOs of Melt Cosmetics, one of the biggest independent makeup brands. The fast-paced, fans-first business keeps these fierce makeup moguls busy balancing friendship, life and the highly competitive beauty industry.
imdb.title: Lipstick Empire
plot: In LIPSTICK EMPIRE, follow Lora Arellano and Dana Bomar, co-founders and CEOs of Melt Cosmetics, one of the biggest independent makeup brands. The fast-paced, fans-first business keeps these fierce makeup moguls busy balancing friendship, life and the highly competitive beauty industry.
